**2022-02-02 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **constraints: move to x/exp for Go 1.18** [#50792](https://golang.org/issue/50792)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **time: add Time.ZoneBounds** [#50062](https://golang.org/issue/50062)
  - retitled
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/time/rate: expose the number of remaining tokens** [#50035](https://golang.org/issue/50035)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **Go Memory Model clarifications** [#50590](https://golang.org/issue/50590)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **spec: safe multidimensional array conversion** [#50118](https://golang.org/issue/50118)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **archive/tar: add FileInfoNames interface** [#50102](https://golang.org/issue/50102)
  - retitled
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **encoding/binary: add AppendByteOrder** [#50601](https://golang.org/issue/50601)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **os/exec: improved API and default behavior for the PWD env variable** [#50599](https://golang.org/issue/50599)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **cmd/go: accept tags of the form X.Y.Z (without leading 'v') as semantic versions** [#32945](https://golang.org/issue/32945)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **cmd/vet: report unused type parameters** [#50914](https://golang.org/issue/50914)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **time: export zone and zoneTrans, and add a function to generate a Location** [#49951](https://golang.org/issue/49951)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/crypto: yescrypt support** [#49898](https://golang.org/issue/49898)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **all: drop netbsd/arm64 port** [#50451](https://golang.org/issue/50451)
  - discussion ongoing
- **bufio: add Reader.Buffer** [#50960](https://golang.org/issue/50960)
  - added to minutes
  - commented
- **cmd/go: Add a \`-C\`flag to \`go\` - change dir** [#50332](https://golang.org/issue/50332)
  - commented
- **cmd/go: Need an easy/obvious way to copy testdata from module cache to a test-running directory** [#50312](https://golang.org/issue/50312)
  - commented
- **cmd/go: stamp the pseudo-version in builds generated by \`go build\`** [#50603](https://golang.org/issue/50603)
  - commented
- **crypto/sha256: add native SHA256 instruction implementation for AMD64** [#50543](https://golang.org/issue/50543)
  - discussion ongoing
- **crypto/tls: expose all presented certs in error type on handshake failure** [#48152](https://golang.org/issue/48152)
  - commented
- **crypto/tls: implement RFC7627** [#43922](https://golang.org/issue/43922)
  - discussion ongoing
- **crypto/x509: add ParseRevocationList, deprecate ParseCRL & ParseDERCRL** [#50674](https://golang.org/issue/50674)
  - discussion ongoing
- **crypto: include support for DTLS in stdlib or x/crypto** [#46915](https://golang.org/issue/46915)
  - discussion ongoing
- **doc: update Go memory model** [#50859](https://golang.org/issue/50859)
  - added to minutes
- **encoding/xml: add ability to create decoder with start element already on stack** [#49313](https://golang.org/issue/49313)
  - discussion ongoing
- **errors: add errors.Mark to support error marks** [#50819](https://golang.org/issue/50819)
  - commented
- **go/types: export term/termlist logic** [#50963](https://golang.org/issue/50963)
  - added to minutes
- **io: implement WriterTo on result of MultiReader** [#50842](https://golang.org/issue/50842)
  - added to minutes
- **net/textproto: ReadMIMEHeader to return the original order of the parsed headers** [#50868](https://golang.org/issue/50868)
  - added to minutes
- **net: make LookupCNAME consistent between Unix and Windows, document** [#50101](https://golang.org/issue/50101)
  - commented
- **os/exec: add fields for managing termination signals and pipes** [#50436](https://golang.org/issue/50436)
  - commented
- **path/filepath: add HasSuffix function** [#50943](https://golang.org/issue/50943)
  - added to minutes
  - commented
- **reflect: add \`Value.CallInto\`** [#49340](https://golang.org/issue/49340)
  - discussion ongoing

  - added to minutes

  - commented
- **sort: add Find** [#50340](https://golang.org/issue/50340)
  - commented
- **sync/atomic: add typed atomic values** [#50860](https://golang.org/issue/50860)
  - added to minutes

  - commented

  - commented
